潕字的基本解释

潕
wǔ
〔潕水〕又作“舞水”，古河名。a.在中国河南省；b.在中国贵州省。

潕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǔ］
［《廣韻》文甫切，上麌，微。］
(1)水名。一名舞水。源出今河南省方城县东。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·潕水》。
(2)水名。源出贵州省瓮安县，东流至湖南省境，注入沅江。参阅《汉书·地理志上》。今本《汉书》作“無水”。

潕字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潕； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第01
【唐韻】文甫切【集韻】罔甫切，?音武。水名。【說文】水出南陽舞隂。　又縣名。【水經注】葉陂水，東逕潕陽縣故城北。　又潕溪，武陵五溪之一。【後漢·馬援傳註】潕，一音武。今溪在辰州界。

潕字的源字形

潕字的起名意思

暂无。

Chi
Basic explanation of words
Chi
wǔ
〔潕水〕also known as "dancing water", the name of the ancient river. a. In Henan Province, China; b. In Guizhou Province, China.
Chi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǔ］
["Guangyun" Wen Fuqie, Shangzhe, Wei. ]
(1) Water name. A dance water. It originated in the east of Fangcheng County, Henan Province. Refer to Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Shui Jing Zhu·Shui".
(2) Water name. It originates from Weng'an County in Guizhou Province, flows east to Hunan Province, and flows into Yuanjiang River. Refer to "Book of Han Geography". Today's "Hanshu" is written as "no water".
Chi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潕; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 649 01
【Tang Yun】Wen Fu cut 【Ji Yun】Non Fu cut,? Yin Wu. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Nanyang Wuyin.　Also the county name. [Notes on Water Classics] Ye Beishui, east to the north of the ancient city of Chiyang County.　Yixi, one of Wuling Five Streams. [Note to the Later Han·Ma Yuan Biography] Chi, Yi Yin Wu. Jinxi is in the boundary of Chenzhou.
